website_summaries.verdict: This wine making kit can also be used for distilling brandy and other alcohols.
pros: Made in a high chrome stainless steel
Also comes in 2, 3, and 8 gallon sizes
Available online videos from the company help make this wine making product easy to use
cons: The overall quality on this product is fair, but not the highest available

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this still around October 2017. I have used it mostly for making gin. It has worked well and hasn't broken down. Today I made another batch of gin and it works great. I recommend the still if you're a beginner to mid level experience at using a still. It's easy to set up and you just have to be creative on positioning it so it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Moriant

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my husband and he LOVES it. This comes with a thumper, which many kits available online do not have. The seals are tight, the welds are tight, and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: My still works wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: My still works wonderful!!! I screwed up my wash and didn't dump out the remaining before adding new...lower proof now it went from 100 to 60 but I still have 30 gallons of mash to process so it will be okay. I did notice that you can only fill the pot half full at a time or it will cloud up. Does anyone know if I can buy extra gasket seals?
customer_reviews.author: S. Schriner

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised. The video could be better with more explanation, but was still helpful. The workmanship and fit & finish wasn't bad but could be slightly better. I wish the funnel portion of the water filler was much bigger, because it's small size only allows you to add about 0.3 oz at a time to the boiler. The thermometer requires two silicone gaskets because the fitting isn't very good. None of these issues prevent me from using it. In general, it's a fine still at a low cost. I use it as a small test distiller instead of my large commercial 35 gallon distiller.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could get a replacement for the damaged pot they sent me.
customer_reviews.text: RECIEVED IT WITH MAJOR FOLD CREASE DENT INSIDE IT. It takes 190-200 degrees to get the thumper to start perking. But it will brew without the thumper at the needed 170 degree non scorching Mark. Made good wine but you could get a cup or 2 more if the thumper could thump at 170 instead of 190-200 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flux
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived good, undamaged. Definitely do an initial run before anything serious, flux/carbon around welds was heavy but after a cleaning and light scrub, perfect. Temp. gage broke after overtightening to fix leak but for the cost it's worth it; only other thing I'd add is don't waste time on the 3gal, just go the 5. Happy boiling
customer_reviews.author: AXXILLA

customer_reviews.title: I cannot use it very much, it is a illegal in the state I live, I store it at a friends out-of-state, and use it regularly when
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this, it came in just as it was advertised. The thermometer did not work, the company quickly mailed me a new one, along with the O-ring that seals it. It works well, and is more than I was expecting. I cannot use it very much, it is a illegal in the state I live, I store it at a friends out-of-state, and use it regularly when I am there.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Vincent Cheney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made, not well packed but made it O.K. Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Warlock

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no instructions and all links to websites sent with it were bad links.
customer_reviews.author: K. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Best in quality design and materials
customer_reviews.text: Extremely exceptional high quality materials used throughout. Easy to set up. Looks great. Just like the description.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Goergen

customer_reviews.title: Works but not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is only good for a few uses. It rusts no matter how careful one is with cleaning and drying. I wish I would have researched before I purchased this product because an American made 8 gallon pot still or thump still is the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: ok, if you have time and patient on your hand, tiny little drops will appear
customer_reviews.author: Igor Faleev

customer_reviews.title: Great gift. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day early! Workmanship is a little rough but sealed nicely. Priced right for its value. My dad would have loved to have one of these. Perfect for a party theme that can be served.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Twork

customer_reviews.title: Moonshine!
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. I didn’t realize when ordering that you can also ferment in the pot. Everything seems high quality
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works, but cheaply made and the gaskets wear out quick. Okay for a starter but won't last long
customer_reviews.author: bucknasty

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: thermometer is broken and not working when i checked to see if it worked i guess just cheap made and was bent and damaged not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kit for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived a day early. Everything looked great! It was super easy to put together. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher P Swartz

customer_reviews.title: Ready to make some sprits.
customer_reviews.text: Unit arrived quicker than expected, items just as described. After you register with seller he will email you more detailed instructions and vidio links. Seller also responds quickly to questions via email. Unit easy to build, good welds tested no leaks nice tight seals. Happy with purchase would buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly, high quality can't wait to try it out
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice came fast and as it is in the picture I would buy another
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New to distillation
customer_reviews.text: I just received the product but haven't used it yet. The construction is high quality. I bought another similar design by a different manufacturer for about the same price and am very confident in saying that this one is much better quality material and craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The all stainless system make for easy cleanup. 5-star
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived within two weeks. I think what AMA calls the fruit container, may also be a distiller thumper. The all stainless system make for easy cleanup. 5-star
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: ... product but the instructions could have been a lot better
customer_reviews.text: Quality product but the instructions could have been a lot better
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and service. Arrived 3 days after I ordered it. Can't wait to use it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and the design is not so great. This takes some modification to function properly
customer_reviews.text: I have made brandy, rum, and vodka so far. The fit and finish is a few steps above mediocre, and the design is not so great. This takes some modification to function properly, but it works nonetheless
customer_reviews.author: RAydel

customer_reviews.title: The still is great work really well
customer_reviews.text: The still is great work really well. The only thing wrong is the seal on the thumper keg was broken where it is joined together. With a little redneck know how I was able to do a temporary fix to be able to run a water vinegar mix through the still for the cleaning and preparation for it
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Overall satisfied without having used yet.
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. Actually received before estimated delivery date. Welds are average for the type of materials it is made out of. Have not used as of this date. Metal is kind of thin but should be adequate.
customer_reviews.author: JOSHUA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect setup, and quality product pieces.
customer_reviews.text: A well crafted setup. Every part well made. Easy to assemble and operate. I flushed out each piece, then ran a test run to flush out the system. Worked amazingly great. From other reviews I added a few green tea bags to flavor the first batch. This would help to remove any gasket taste in the finished product. It made extra dark tea in the first pot. Still amazingly the finished product came out crystal clear. I ran for about ten minutes. I had not set up a steady water supply, for the third coil condenser cooling pot. Very important to have a steady supply of cold water. I will get extra adapters later. Worked perfect the very first run.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Phillips Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Works great - I did first run to test it out with plain water, no leaks and didn't smell at all. Made a batch of brandy/grappa which took about 30 minutes for not quite one gallon. Definitely watch the Youtube videos. Easy to clean. UPDATE: Do not remove the potholder and screw in the center of the still pot...it did not seal 100% which I found when I next used it resulting in a small leak. I'll need to buy a food grade washer or plastic to wedge around the screw hole. Didn't leak before. ALSO, I used a pond pump affixed to the cooling coil pot.
customer_reviews.author: Seiche

customer_reviews.title: You Get What you Pay For!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo freaking cheaply built. Dented and rusting. Spend the extra money and get a better still. These folks don't care about quality or customer satisfaction. I trashed this crap shortly after receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: DeathDaddy

customer_reviews.title: almost great
customer_reviews.text: gasket rings melt and get into product. thumper doesn't work.. It does produce 140 proof on first run without thumper and 170 proof on second round. if done correctly you can make around 750ml or 32oz at 170 proof for 2 gal of 20% mash. You will have to constantly monitor water flow thru the worm and pay close attention to temp for cuts. very hard to catch only hearts at this small of a volume.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Product works pretty well except you need a washer between the nut and the silicone ring seal for the temperature gauge.The seal rolls out around the nut when it is tightened and vapor leaks out around the temp gauge. Other than that the workmanship is OK,not great, but it gets the job done at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Bove

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: It’s well put together and works very well. I am using it to distill water and it’s a simple process with two pots and it is convenient thanks to all the extras that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Spot welding of handles and brazing of fittings exhibited very poor workmanship. Deformation of the surrounding metal was significant. Discoloration from spot welding and brazing was left unfinished. Welding residue (black soot) was stuck to several surface areas.
customer_reviews.author: Joesph P Kranak

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Even ran a few quarts of water ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Even ran a few quarts of water through and tested for undesirable metals and found nothing. Great product, can't beat the price, and the shipping was much faster than originally thought.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Swannie

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Great for price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking with high chrome stainless steel. Great clamping system and has quality welds. Perfect size for making distilled water for my aquarium.
customer_reviews.author: John Poshka

customer_reviews.title: It has so many uses. My thermometer is accurate ...
customer_reviews.text: It has so many uses. My thermometer is accurate and amazingly in Fahrenheit.
customer_reviews.author: Just The Facts

customer_reviews.title: Only the perfect tool for the job
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best!! Top notch craftsmanship. He went above and beyond especially when the shippers gouged the large pot making it unusable. I sent him pictures and he sent me the large pot with no dings or blemishes. Honest, no bs, and a fair price! Go get yourself one from this guy
customer_reviews.author: George Ackerman-Behr

customer_reviews.title: Defientely have enjoyed some recipes with this
customer_reviews.text: Defientely have enjoyed some recipes with this. Its self explanatory and easy to use. A wise investment for those looking to get a start in home based distillation.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Grathler

customer_reviews.title: Do it yourself home distiller
customer_reviews.text: Great still for the first time Brewer. I would only recommend getting a bigger condenser or worm bucket. The liquid heats up to quick to use the one gallon pot included. I made a bigger condenser on my own from Home Depot
customer_reviews.author: PATRICK MILLS

customer_reviews.title: easy enough to get an adapter
customer_reviews.text: Not the quality I was hoping for... spice chamber lid doesn't fit coil wrong threads, easy enough to get an adapter. ..... we'll see
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The pot came patched where they banged it and it got welded with metal so if I let water s*** there it starts to rust, so I'm disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Aaron G

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars I think it is a great product
customer_reviews.text: It was packaged well and came ahead of schedule I am pleased with it's looks. the assmbly instructions are a bit vague the seller offers E mail help so I am sure it is on its way. I am looking forward to hours of fun with this. I contacted the supplier on a weekend and received an answer in less than 24 hrs answering all my questions and more I am very satisfied and would purchase again anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Jim wright

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff for the home
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good condition Nicely made Anxious to get started Guidance is much appreciated
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: ... thermometer was not calibrated correctly but everything else was fine.
customer_reviews.text: The thermometer was not calibrated correctly but everything else was fine.
customer_reviews.author: A J

product_meta.title: YUEWO 3 Pots DIY 5 Gal 20 Litres Copper Alcohol Moonshine Still Spirits Boiler Water Brandy Distiller
product_meta.description:
Color:Copper| Size:5Gal/20Litres

Thanks for Shopping in our Amazon Store, we are a professional business company, we WMN_TRULYSTEP have engaged in online business for about 8 years, we always providing the best products and the best service !

 This set of moonshine stills is a complete wine making sets, great alembic still for beginners or expert distiller,portable and easy to handle. and We have test everything when we sending the package out.

We have continuously improved our products over the past years to make it easier for customers to use our distillation equipment.Fermenter pot is more 25% Thicker,3 Pots Distiller, Stainless / Copper Coil cooling Tube,Innovative the Steam flow into the side of Fruit/Spice Pot,flow out from the top,Operator can brew his own taste easily.

 Boiler Material: stainless steel.

 The cooling coil cooler: copper or stainless steel pipe to shape.

 Length: 170cm/ 67 inches for 2 or 3 Gal, 250cm / 100 inches for 5 or 8 Gal.

 Construction: The construction is all Stainless steel which has been argon welded thus avoiding any of the health problems associated with copper and solder constructed stills.

 Welding technique: The item is argon welded to avoid any of the health issues associated with welding and solder constructed alcohol stills.

 Heat source: induction cooler, stove, or any other heating sources are OK!

 ★You will need (NOT include) : yeast,water supply,heat source(I suggest use induction cooker or gas stove) , all the items are the same the pictures showed , Contact me anytime when you need additional help.

 ★NOTE★: you can NOT use the water-pump when making wine, because it is hard to control the flow of the water, but you can use the house tap, or manually, Normally, buyer from USA can receive the products within 7~10 working days.
feature_bullets: Moonshine Stills - complete distillation equipment,suitable for beginners or expert distiller,easy to handle and installation.3 Pots Distiller,Innovative the Steam flow into the side of Fruit/Spice Pot, flow out from the top,So operator can brew his own taste easily!

Material and Construction - safe & non-toxic red copper and stainless steel material,There is NOT ANY lead in all the parts,Stainless / Copper Coil cooling Tube , all the parts are made of food-grade materials,The fermenter is specially thickened.(Dimensions:capacity: 5 Gallons / 20L, Height: 9.8inch, Diameter: 9.8inch.)

Build-in Thermometer - Metal Thermometers show as: Celsius & Fahrenheit, So Operator can Inspect the Temperature easily when Running the Distiller,Free Stainless Steam Plate and Gauze Bag, to prevent Burn Out, and has much better on distillation. Free Temperature Sticker on the Fermenter, can inspect the Temperature when use the big pot as a Fermenter Pot.

Multipurpose Usage - there are many different ways to use our Moonshine Alcohol Still,home distiller can be used for seawater distillation,steam distillation and for distilling alcohol.According to your favorite,you can make different kinds of items in the moonshine stills such as Alcohol, Ethanol, Whiskey, Water Distiller, Wine Making, Essential Oils, Hydrosol,etc.

★★★★★ 100% REFUND GUARANTEE - We guarantee One Year Warranty，Online Video Guide and Free Parts Exchanged，You can rest assured to buy. If you are not fully satisfied with our products, we will give you a full refund.
